mapper.select:
select * from (select ycdm, count(*) value from bdcdj_check t where 1 = 1
and (t.qxdm=#{cityCode} or pqxdm=#{cityCode} )
and t.sjrksj between to_date(#{starttime}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') and to_date(#{endtime}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
group by ycdm) pivot(sum(value) for ycdm in(201,202,203,204,205))

choose.otherwise:
select s.QXDM sid,tt.* from dic_v_xzq_s s left join ( select * from (select ycdm, t.pqxdm, count(*) value from bdcdj_check t where 1 = 1
and t.sjrksj between to_date(#{starttime}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') and to_date(#{endtime}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
group by ycdm, pqxdm) pivot(sum(value) for ycdm in(201, 202, 203, 204, 205)) )tt on s.QXDM=tt.pqxdm

mapper.select: select distinct (q.ywh), q.bdcdyh, 1 type, q.djlx, (select t.itemname from dic_item t where t.diccode = '178AC3C2ABA7456F8C2AF55FCCD9DD5F' and t.itemval = q.djlx) lx from QLBHGX q where q.ywh = #{ywh} and q.qxdm = #{qxdm} union all select distinct (q.ywh), q.bdcdyh, 2 type, q.djlx, (select t.itemname from dic_item t where t.diccode = '178AC3C2ABA7456F8C2AF55FCCD9DD5F' and t.itemval = q.djlx) lx from QLBHGX q where q.yywh = #{ywh} and q.qxdm = #{qxdm} union all select distinct (q.ywh), q.bdcdyh, 2 type, q.djlx, (select t.itemname from dic_item t where t.diccode = '178AC3C2ABA7456F8C2AF55FCCD9DD5F' and t.itemval = q.djlx) lx from QLBHGX q where q.qxdm = #{qxdm} and q.ywh = (select distinct yywh from QLBHGX where ywh = #{ywh} and qxdm = #{qxdm})
select zdbsid,bhyy,bhnr,djsj,dbr from ZDBHQK where zdbsid=#{ywbsid}
select * from LJZ a where a.zrzh=#{id}
select distinct (t.bdcdyh),SUBSTR(t.bdcdyh,20,1) LX,t.bdcdyh name from Bdcdj_Bdcdy t where t.bdcdyh like #{id}||'%'
select zrzh from zrz_att where zddm=#{id}
select bdcdyh from h where zrzh=#{id}

select s.*,t.* from (select * from dual) left join (select a.YWH,a.QLLX ,a.DJLX,a.DJYY,a.TDSYQR,a.DYTDMJ,a.FTTDMJ,a.TDSYQSSJ,a.TDSYJSSJ,a.FDCJYJG, a.GHYT,a.FWXZ,a.jzmj,a.zyjzmj,a.ftjzmj from JG_DJB_UNION_FW_V a where a.YWBSID=#{YWBSID}) s on 1=1 left join (select b.QLRLX,b.QLRMC,b.ZJZL,b.ZJH from QLR b where GLYWBSID=#{YWBSID}) t on 1=1

select a.*, b.*, c.*, d.* from (select * from dual) left join (select t.ywh, t.djdl, t.djxl, t.sqzsbs, t.sqfbcz, t.slry, t.slsj, t.qxdm from SLSQ t where t.glywbsid = #{YWBSID}) a on 1=1 left join (select t.qlrmc, t.zjzl, t.zjh from QLR t where t.glywbsid = #{YWBSID}) b on 1 = 1 left join (select t.jdmc, t.shyj, t.shryxm, t.shjssj from SH t where t.glywbsid = #{YWBSID}) c on 1 = 1 left join (select t.szzh, t.ysxlh from SZ t where glywbsid = #{YWBSID}) d on 1 = 1

select a.ywid, --业务ID a.yywh, --原业务ID a.djlx, --登记类型 b.ywh, --原业务号
b.cflx, --查封类型 b.cffw, --查封范围 b.CFJG, --查封机关 b.CFWH, --查封文号 b.CFQSSJ, --查封起始时间 b.CFJSSJ, --查封结束时间
null as djsj, --登记时间
null as dyfs, --抵押方式 null as dybdclx, --抵押类型：抵押不动产类型 null as qlrmc, --抵押人(更改) null as bdcdjzmh, --抵押证明号：不动产登记证明号 null as djyy, --登记原因
null as dbr, --登簿人 null as djjg, --登记机构 null as yysx --异议事项 from (select t.ywid, t.yywh, t.djlx from QLBHGX t where DJLX in ('800') and t.YYWID =#{YWBSID}) a left join (select t.ywh, t.cflx, t.cffw, t.CFJG, t.CFWH, t.CFQSSJ, t.CFJSSJ from CFDJ t where t.ywbsid = #{YWBSID}) b on 1 = 1
union all
select a.ywid, --业务ID a.yywh, --原业务ID a.djlx, --登记类型 b.ywh, --原业务号
null as cflx, --查封类型 null as cffw, --查封范围 null as CFJG, --查封机关 null as CFWH, --查封文号 null as CFQSSJ, --查封起始时间 null as CFJSSJ, --查封结束时间
b.djsj, --登记时间
b.dyfs, --抵押方式 b.dybdclx, --抵押类型：抵押不动产类型 b.dyr as qlrmc, --抵押人(更改) b.bdcdjzmh, --抵押证明号：不动产登记证明号 b.djyy, --登记原因
null as dbr, --登簿人 null as djjg, --登记机构 null as yysx --异议事项
from (select t.ywid, t.yywh, t.djlx from QLBHGX t where DJLX in ('900') and t.YYWID = #{YWBSID}) a left join (select t.YWH , t.DYFS , t.DYBDCLX, t.DYR, t.BDCDJZMH, t.DJSJ, t.DJYY from DYAQ t where t.ywbsid = #{YWBSID}) b on 1 = 1 union all
select a.ywid, --业务ID a.yywh, --原业务ID a.djlx, --登记类型 b.ywh, --原业务号
null as cflx, --查封类型 null as cffw, --查封范围 null as CFJG, --查封机关 null as CFWH, --查封文号 null as CFQSSJ, --查封起始时间 null as CFJSSJ, --查封结束时间
b.djsj, --登记时间
null as dyfs, --抵押方式 null as dybdclx, --抵押类型：抵押不动产类型 null as qlrmc, --抵押人(更改) null as djyy, --登记原因
b.dbr, --登簿人 b.BDCDJZMH, --异议证明号：不动产登记证明号 b.djjg, --登记机构 b.yysx --异议事项 from (select t.ywid, t.yywh, t.djlx from QLBHGX t where DJLX in ('600') and t.YYWID = #{YWBSID}) a left join (select t.YWH, t.DBR, t.BDCDJZMH, t.DJJG, t.DJSJ, t.YYSX from YYDJ t where t.ywbsid = #{YWBSID}) b on 1 = 1

choose.when:
select s.QXMC, t.* from dic_v_xzq_x s left join (select qxdm, sum(t.ywl) ywl, sum(t.scdj) scdj, sum(zydj) zydj, sum(t.BGDJ) bgdj, sum(t.ZXDJ) zxdj, sum(t.GZDJ) gzdj, sum(t.yydj) yydj, sum(t.YGDJ) ygdj, sum(t.CFDJ) cfdj, sum(t.QTDJ) qtdj from jg_ywl_union_v t
where t.tjsj between to_date(#{startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') and to_date(#{endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
group by qxdm) t on s.QXDM = t.QXDM
where s.PQXDM=#{cityCode} order by to_number(s.id)
choose.otherwise:
select s.QXMC, t.* from dic_v_xzq_s s left join (select qxdm, sum(t.ywl) ywl, sum(t.scdj) scdj, sum(zydj) zydj, sum(t.BGDJ) bgdj, sum(t.ZXDJ) zxdj, sum(t.GZDJ) gzdj, sum(t.yydj) yydj, sum(t.YGDJ) ygdj, sum(t.CFDJ) cfdj, sum(t.QTDJ) qtdj from jg_ywl_union_v t
where t.tjsj between to_date(#{startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') and to_date(#{endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
group by qxdm) t on s.QXDM = (substr(t.QXDM, 0, 4) || '00') order by to_number(s.id)

choose.when:
select s.QXMC,tt.* from dic_v_xzq_x s left join (select * from (select t.qxdm, t.ycdm, count(*) value from bdcdj_check t where 1=1
and t.sjrksj between to_date(#{startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') and to_date(#{endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
group by t.qxdm, t.ycdm) pivot(sum(value) for ycdm in(201,202,203,204,205))) tt on s.QXDM = tt.qxdm where s.PQXDM=#{cityCode} order by to_number(s.ID)
choose.otherwise:
select s.QXMC,tt.* from dic_v_xzq_s s left join (select * from (select t.pqxdm, t.ycdm, count(*) value from bdcdj_check t where 1=1
and t.sjrksj between to_date(#{startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') and to_date(#{endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
group by t.pqxdm, t.ycdm) pivot(sum(value) for ycdm in(201, 202,203,204,205))) tt on s.QXDM = tt.pqxdm order by to_number(s.ID)

mapper.select:
select * from (select to_char(t.sjrksj, 'yyyy-MM-dd') sjrksj, ycdm, count(*) value from bdcdj_check t where 1 = 1
and t.sjrksj between to_date(#{startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') and to_date(#{endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
and (t.pqxdm=#{cityCode} or t.qxdm=#{cityCode})
group by to_char(t.sjrksj, 'yyyy-MM-dd'), ycdm) pivot(sum(value) for ycdm in(201,202,203,204,205)) order by sjrksj

select YWBSID, YWH,DJLX,BDCQZH,BDCDYH,ZSXLH,ZL,FZRQ,QXMC,qxdm from BDCDJ_DJB where 1=1
and YWH like '%'||#{ywh}||'%'
and BDCDYH like '%'||#{bdcdyh}||'%'
and ZSXLH like '%'||#{zsxlh}||'%'
and DJLX =#{djlx}

select ywbsid,bdcdyh, ywh, djlx, ycsm, djjg, fxsj, clqk, fkry,(select k.xzqmc from DIC_XZQ k where k.xzqdm=b.qxdm) as QXMC,c.zdmc ycdm from BDCDJ_CHECK b,bdcdj_code c where 1=1 and b.ycdm=c.zdid
and (b.qxdm=#{cityCode} or b.pqxdm=#{cityCode})
and b.ywh like '%'||#{ywh}||'%'
and b.djlx =#{djlx}
and b.ycdm =#{ycdm}
and b.sjrksj between(to_date(#{startDate},'yyyy-MM-dd')) and (to_date(#{endDate},'yyyy-MM-dd'))
order by b.fxsj desc

select d.qlrmc qlrmc,d.djlx,b.*,d.ywh from bdcdj_bdcdy b, bdcdj_djb d where b.bdcdyh=d.bdcdyh and b.qxdm like #{qxdm}||'%' and ( b.BDCDYH like '%'||#{bdcdyh}||'%' or b.ZL like '%'||#{bdcdyh}||'%' or d.qlrmc like '%'||#{bdcdyh}||'%'
)
